text: You should donate to Save the Children.
I would like to donate $0
I suggest you donate something because they help to save many lives.
I am not interested in saving lives. I would like to donate $0
Can I ask why?
I would prefer more money for myself.
do you hope others donate?
I do not care one way or the other.
By donating, you are ensuring children's rights to health and safety and education
I understand, I am simply not interested in donating today.
Your donation will do a lot to help kids
I have to help myself before I help others.
You are helping yourself first by donating. People who donate receive back a lot more than they give
That is a good point. I have heard of that principle before. However how do I know I can trust this charity?
They are not regulated by the government and they are international, not local
I think I will stick to my original decision of donating $0.
A simple internet search will show you what they have done. They need your donation
Maybe I can donate sometime in the future.
Okay, thank you for your time then
Okay thank you, I will stick to my original decision of donating $0.
